about_the_game:
Dark Alley Elf is an action-platformer featuring hot and heavy sexual content.

Take your trusty iron pipe and fight your way through several unique enemies, going from street to street until you reign the back alleys as slut supreme.



In a modern-era world where fantasy races coexist peacefully alongside humans- Francesca the dark elf has found herself embroiled in a high stakes competition with her long time rival, famed company heiress Annabelle. The challenge? Be the one to earn the most money in a week's time.

Stacked against almost impossible odds, Francesca decides to do what she does best- practicing the world's oldest profession on the seedy big city streets.

Dark Alley Elf features a diverse grab bag of content and gameplay systems:



  • NAVIGATE through the dangerous city streets and sewers!
  • SMASH your way past an onslaught of lecherous thugs!
  • COLLECT power-ups which aid you in your quest!
  • LUST over a variety of hot interactive sex scenes!
  • JAM OUT to a fully original soundtrack full of jazzy goodness!

content_descriptors.notes: The content contained in this game depicts both consenting individuals and mild non-consensual situations with the main heroine, Francesca. All depicted individuals are adults over the age of 21.

detailed_description:
Just Updated


Players can now choose between two campaigns- STORY MODE and CLASSIC MODE

STORY MODE - Eight all new carefully handcrafted levels which progress in difficulty.
CLASSIC MODE - The original campaign with open-ended exploration & progression.

VIEW UNLOCKED SCENES IN THE BRAND NEW GALLERY & MINIGAME MODES

name: Dark Alley Elf

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 and Newer
  • Processor: 2+ GHz processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Not an integrated video card; DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

short_description: Play as Francesca the dark elf as she, on a bet, travels the city to find willing men to pay for her services! Fight off thugs and other strange creatures in this sexy action platformer!
